headline: Is Now the Right Time for Constellation Energy After Shares Soar Over 50% in 2025?
summary: Deciding what to do with Constellation Energy stock right now might feel a bit daunting, especially after seeing how this name has surged over the last few years. The stock’s recent moves are hard to ignore: up 4.9% in the past week, an impressive 20.3% in the last month, and a staggering 59.3% year-to-date. Zooming out further, those who bought three years ago have enjoyed over 350% returns. That sort of performance tends to grab attention, and for good reason. Much of this relentless...
